attributes.action: SUPPORT ANIMAL EXPERIMENTATION FOR FURTHER MEDICAL BREAKTHROUGH
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Through animal experimentation many cures for diseases have been discovered including 
Polio,
Measles,
Mumps &
Rubella.
Support animal experimentation and help further medical breakthrough to cure more diseases and save more lives.

rejection.details: Please address the excessive use of capital letters; they make your petition hard to read.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
